Veterans returning home from Iraq and Afghanistan make up for some of the highest unemployment rates in the country. For the young veterans coming back from Iraq and Afghanistan, it's as high as 20 percent. We need to do better in terms of making opportunities to these veterans so that they can get jobs, good paying jobs, to provide for their families and start their own small businesses, Kirsten Gillibrand said. political operatives say he must do if he hopes to be re-elected.`` The jury is still out on which way the Bill Clinton is going to go,'' said Greg Mueller , a Republican political strategist. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. `` For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center,'' said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri.`` This country is not ready for a pure progressive.
